channel.title: It wont start up?!
channel.description:
My client only statrs up when i run it from Jframe!? Why is this!! So, i have to use this code in ym run.bat
[CODE]@ECHO OFF TITLE BlazeScape start javaw -Xmx1500m -cp .;Theme.jar Jframe 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/CODE] In another version of client (my backup) it uses this to run it! [CODE]TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause
[/CODE] But like i said, if i use that the client doesn't even start up... ARG!! Ive also tryed other ones like this; [CODE]TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M Client
pause
[/CODE]
Still wont pop up... So why will the client only pop up when it says Jframe in it?? But when it pops up, it just freezes!!
ARG!! WTF?!
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll245/mjownzu_07/error.jpg[/img]
I get that error in my run.bat when i use this code
[code]TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M Jframe
pause
[/code]

item.title: It wont start up?!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI pause

or start with the Gui class if you’re using a jframe.

Read full topic

item.title: It wont start up?!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

My client only statrs up when i run it from Jframe!? Why is this!! So, i have to use this code in ym run.bat

@ECHO OFF TITLE BlazeScape start javaw -Xmx1500m -cp .;Theme.jar Jframe 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause
In another version of client (my backup) it uses this to run it!

[CODE]TITLE Client
@echo off
cls

java -Xmx800M EGUI

pause

[/CODE]
But like i said, if i use that the client doesn’t even start up… ARG!!
Ive also tryed other ones like this;

[CODE]TITLE Client
@echo off
cls

java -Xmx800M Client

pause

[/CODE]

Still wont pop up…
So why will the client only pop up when it says Jframe in it?? But when it pops up, it just freezes!!

ARG!! WTF?!

I get that error in my run.bat when i use this code

[code]TITLE Client
@echo off
cls

java -Xmx800M Jframe

pause

[/code]

Read full topic
